quotes.quote: Leisure is the time for doing something useful. This leisure the diligent person will obtain, the lazy one never.
It's not a man's working hours that is important, it is how he spends his leisure time.
If you are losing your leisure, look out! — It may be you are losing your soul.
Leisure is only possible when we are at one with ourselves. We tend to overwork as a means of self-escape, as a way of trying to justify our existence.
Leisure only means a chance to do other jobs that demand attention.
It is in his pleasure that a man really lives; it is from his leisure that he constructs the true fabric of self.
A life of leisure never satisfies anyone who possesses a lively mind.
Those who decide to use leisure as a means of mental development, who love good music, good books, good pictures, good company, good conversation, are the happiest people in the world.

Work is external to the worker. . . . It is not part of his nature; consequently he does not fulfill himself in his work but denies himself. . . . The worker therefore feels himself at home only during his leisure time, whereas at work he feels homeless.
Organizing your leisure effectively is the highest level of civilization.
The real problem of leisure time is how to keep others from using yours.
Spend your leisure time in cultivating an ear attentive to discourse, for in this way you will find that you learn with ease what others have found out with difficulty.
Work is only justified by leisure time. To admit the emptiness of leisure time is to admit the impossibility of life.
If the use of leisure time is confined to looking at TV for a few extra hours every day, we will deteriorate as a people.
A broad margin of leisure is as beautiful in a man's life as in a book.
To be able to fill leisure intelligently is the last product of civilization.
The soul is dyed with the color of its leisure thoughts.
In our leisure we reveal what kind of people we are.
All intellectual improvement arises from leisure.
Employ thy time well, if thou meanest to gain leisure.
It is that unoccupied space which makes a room habitable, as it is our leisure hours which make life endurable.
The end of labor is to gain leisure.
Getting to know experienced people is the best leisure time you can have.
Leisure isn't always relaxation and it's relaxation that counts.
A life of leisure and a life of laziness are two things.
In order to become prosperous, a person must initially work very hard, so he or she has to sacrifice a lot of leisure time.
Leisure time is that five or six hours when you sleep at night.
Leisure, some degree of it, is necessary to the health of every man's spirit.
The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
